language.name: English
In the Hall of the Piglin King: In the Hall of the Piglin King
Explore the terrifying, and rewarding, I: Explore the terrifying, and rewarding, Incendium Nether
Destroys ghast fireballs that it can see: Destroys ghast fireballs that it can see.
Drains the life of its wielder: Drains the life of its wielder
Emits a brilliant light when dropped: Emits a brilliant light when dropped
Drains the life of its slain victims: Drains the life of its slain victims
Use the Infernal Wing to upgrade your el: Use the Infernal Wing to upgrade your elytra in a Smithing Table
Enter the chaotic Extreme Basalt Deltas: Enter the chaotic Extreme Basalt Deltas
Kill a Desert Blaze on the boundary of l: Kill a Desert Blaze on the boundary of light and dark to get both of its drops
Put on some chain armor and use it to di: Put on some chain armor and use it to dispel a restless spirit
Storm a Forbidden Castle and kill every: Storm a Forbidden Castle and kill every last piglin living inside
Survive the Inferno's last spell and cla: Survive the Inferno's last spell and claim your reward.
Give a Sentry a taste of its own medicin: Give a Sentry a taste of its own medicine
Kill one of the odd Desert Blazes native: Kill one of the odd Desert Blazes native to the Infernal Dunes
Enter a Forbidden Castle at your own per: Enter a Forbidden Castle at your own peril
Mine the exposed ancient debris in the h: Mine the exposed ancient debris in the height of the Extreme Basalt Deltas
Feed a Ghastling its odd favorite food -: Feed a Ghastling its odd favorite food - fire charges - to make it follow you
Stand at the intersection of four biomes: Stand at the intersection of four biomes in the Nether
Experience the blazing heat of the Infer: Experience the blazing heat of the Infernal Dunes
Brave the Quartz Flats' frozen lava seas: Brave the Quartz Flats' frozen lava seas
Find the hidden treasure in the Quartz K: Find the hidden treasure in the Quartz Kitchen
Steal some loot from a Piglin Village: Steal some loot from a Piglin Village
Survive the Inferno's \"Nether Sign「Last: Survive the Inferno's "Nether Sign「Last Stand」" with no armor
Discover every type of loot in a Power P: Discover every type of loot in a Power Plant
Loot the treasures of a Phantom Nest: Loot the treasures of a Phantom Nest
Enter a pipeline, but beware the dangero: Enter a pipeline, but beware the dangerous sentry blazes
Enter the Purified Dunes, homeland of th: Enter the Purified Dunes, homeland of the Hovering Inferno
Beware the beautiful and deadly Quartz F: Beware the beautiful and deadly Quartz Flats
Kill a ghast on its home turf above the: Kill a ghast on its home turf above the frozen lava seas
You can't kill the Inferno. Just survive: You can't kill the Inferno. Just survive to win.
Get poisoned by a toxic slime: Get poisoned by a toxic slime
Afflict a ghast with Speed, Regeneration: Afflict a ghast with Speed, Regeneration and Invisibility -- then kill it to obtain its Ghastling
Sacrifice a nether star at an altar to s: Sacrifice a nether star at an altar to summon the Hovering Inferno
Kill the skeleton chef Torte and loot hi: Kill the skeleton chef Torte and loot his kitchen
Enter the nuclear wastelands of the Toxi: Enter the nuclear wastelands of the Toxic Heap
Get hit by a Sentry's lightning attack: Get hit by a Sentry's lightning attack
Enter the Withered Forest, ancestral bat: Enter the Withered Forest, ancestral battleground of the Piglins and Wither Skeletons
Click the name of an item to receive it: Click the name of an item to receive it
Your Fire Staff is at low durability! Re: Your Fire Staff is at low durability! Repair it with a fishing rod in a grindstone or anvil
Your Ice Staff is at low durability! Rep: Your Ice Staff is at low durability! Repair it with a fishing rod in a grindstone or anvil
Your Electric Staff is at low durability: Your Electric Staff is at low durability! Repair it with a fishing rod in a grindstone or anvil
Forge a Command Block in a Smithing Tabl: Forge a Command Block in a Smithing Table with an ominous pearl and a gold block
Find and battle the corrupted Ultris Bos: Find and battle the corrupted Ultris Boss, Corrupted Enderman
No Giant Is Stronger Than Me!: No Giant Is Stronger Than Me!
Throw a strength potion at a zombie and: Throw a strength potion at a zombie and turn it into the Ultris Boss, the Giant.
Throw a weakness potion at a zombie and: Throw a weakness potion at a zombie and turn it into a... baby zombie.
Find a pig with strange purple particles: Find a pig with strange purple particles...
Encounter the magical Ultris Boss, the I: Encounter the magical Ultris Boss, the Illusioner.
Bring out the friends of the lone phanto: Bring out the friends of the lone phantom and discover the Phantom Swarm
Find a phantom all alone by itself in th: Find a phantom all alone by itself in the vastness of the end...
Set flame to a phantom in the end and re: Set flame to a phantom in the end and remove its abillity to summon other phantoms
Venture further and discover the 8 Ultri: Venture further and discover the 8 Ultris Bosses. Follow through the advancements proceeding to find the paths to each boss.
Throw an Enchanted Command Block at a Wi:
Throw an Enchanted Command Block at a Wither, summon the Ultris Boss, Ultra Wither

Command Blocks unlock after defeating Corrupted Enderman
Throw a second command block at the Ultr: Throw a second command block at the Ultra Wither to receive more XP after defeation
Enter the Blaze Kings Tower inside a net: Enter the Blaze Kings Tower inside a nether fortress
Discover a mysterious pyramid high above: Discover a mysterious pyramid high above an end city
Awaken the blazing Ultris Boss, Blaze Ki: Awaken the blazing Ultris Boss, Blaze King
Reach the top of the pyramid and insert: Reach the top of the pyramid and insert an Endstone Key to the pedestol by right clicking its shimmering end rod
Awaken the Ultris boss, ruler of the shu: Awaken the Ultris boss, ruler of the shulkers, the Shulker Stone
Shoot a spectral arrow at the shulker st: Shoot a spectral arrow at the shulker stone, and question the mob it really is
Forge a Ominous Eye Of Ender in a Smithi: Forge a Ominous Eye Of Ender in a Smithing Table with an ominous pearl and blaze powder
Find the Ultris Boss, Sanctum Keeper: Find the Ultris Boss, Sanctum Keeper
Find the Corruption lab inside the Sanct: Find the Corruption lab inside the Sanctum
Create some corrupt dust within the Corr: Create some corrupt dust within the Corruption Lab
Throw corrupt dust on a enderman and con: Throw corrupt dust on a enderman and convert it into a Corrupted Enderman.
Hold an emerald in front of the Sanctum: Hold an emerald in front of the Sanctum Keepers soul and lead it all the way to a village.
Find the sacred stronghold, the Sanctum: Find the sacred stronghold, the Sanctum
Free a trapped soul from a glass contain: Free a trapped soul from a glass container
Run out of the Fortified Sanctum's XP Ma: Run out of the Fortified Sanctum's XP Machine uses, then throw a diamond on top of it to repair it
Find the the Sanctum varient, the Fortif: Find the the Sanctum varient, the Fortified Sanctum
